item.title: Minneapolis live updates: Feds to 'draw down' 700 agents, Homan says
item.description: President Donald Trump's border czar, Tom Homan, was dispatched early last week to Minnesota.

item.title: WATCH: Teen swims for miles to save family
item.description: Austin Applebee battled waves for four hours as he swam 2.5 miles back to the beach to get help after the kayak he, his mom and two siblings were on f...

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Robot dog deployed on slopes of Mount Etna
item.description: Researchers hope the robot will be able to detect gas emissions that could help predict eruptions.

item.title: WATCH: Dog steals journalist's camera and hits record
item.description: A sled dog in Greenland stole a journalist's 360-degree camera for a chew toy and inadvertently hit the record button.
